thread.section_title: Giftbasketsoverseas Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Giftbasketsoverseas | www.giftbasketsoverseas.com
thread.title: Bobbi Brehm

author: Bobbi Brehm
title: Bobbi Brehm
text: My son is at school in the UK and I was going to send him a care package for Valentine's Day but was trying to figure out how to time it so he got it that day, quite a challenge from Canada, so I went online to find a better solution and came across gift baskets overseas. The selection was great so and the price was great considering it would have cost me a lot for shipping so I ordered a basket to be delivered on Valentine's Day to his school. Within minutes I received an email explaining the process for delivering to schools, thanks for the heads up. My son received an awesome basket to the school on Valentine's Day, we BOTH were thrilled. Thanks a million for helping me send my LOVE across an ocean. I'd recommend them to anyone, in fact I already have
